text: ibrāhīm (nabi) tama piyā venuven samāva illā siṭiyē, ohu tama piyāṭa dī tibū ek poronduvakaṭa misa, vena kisivak næta. (ohugē piyā) allāhṭa viruddhavādiyek yayi pæhædiliva dæna gat vahāma, eyin (ohu venuven samāva illā siṭīmen) ohu ǣt vūvēya. niyata vaśayenma ibrāhīm itāmat karuṇāvanta hā yaṭahat pahatbhāvayenda piri keneku vaśayen siṭiyēya
